gene: Harvey rat sarcoma viral oncogene homolog

go_data.justification: HRAS is a GTPase, an enzyme that can bind and hydrolyze GTP.
HRAS is involved in signal transduction pathways, transmitting signals from the cell surface to the interior of the cell.

go_data.term: cellular response to epidermal growth factor stimulus
go_data.justification: HRAS is activated by epidermal growth factor (EGF) and other growth factors, leading to cell proliferation and differentiation.
